ygData.subject: RE: Problems connecting
ygData.msgSnippet: Cool, thanks Wes, I was able to get it to work, something with the video settings. Maybe this will alieviate my problem now of only being able to play in
ygData.messageBody:
Cool, thanks Wes, I was able to get it to work, something with the video
settings. Maybe this will alieviate my problem now of only being able to
play in 800x640. I love re-installs. LOL

Steve

-----Original Message-----
Message: 2
Date: Tue, 11 Feb 2003 02:51:36 -0000
From: "Wes <aihacker@...>" <aihacker@...>
Subject: Re: Problems connecting

Yes I had the exact same error. It was cause by my screen resolution
being 32 bits when my game resolution was set to 16 bits.
You can set the graphics resolution once your in the game, but to get
in the game try setting your display to 16 bits, 32 bits etc until
one works.

Hope that solves your problem.

Wes
